short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to bulk select words and phrases on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yoink allows you to bulk select words of any webpage. It's great for keeping track of new vocabularies and gathering inspirations. Copy to the clipboard before pasting it into your own notes.
